resources.string: Open sourced educational app which contains most commonly used HyperText Transfer Protocol(HTTP) status codes with their Wikipedia and IETF descriptions and references. Fork and create pull request to add new HTTP codes, translate to another language or to make improvements.
Hi, I\'m Anjith Sasindran and I\'m an Android/Java Developer based in India. I\'m an open source enthusiast. Source codes are made available at GitHub.
